participant_1.background:
I go for bike rides with my sons on the weekends.
i am a nurse.
my last name is spanish , but i tell people that it s italian.
I think of silly nicknames for my older brother, and then I start to wonder if people are thinking nice things about him when they hear them.
I like to eat food from my parents' home country.

participant_2.background:
I am pleased that my family is close and that I get to spend a lot of time with them.
I'd rather wear my overalls and boots.
i can beat anyone in chess.
I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art.
I don't need to dress up to impress my husband because he loves me for who I am.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy rock collecting and macaroni art. I have a close knit family and we often spend time together.
That's nice that you have a close family. I like to go for bike rides with my sons on the weekends.
That sounds fun, I'd rather wear my overalls and boots.
I'm a nurse. My last name is Spanish, but I tell people it's Italian.
I'm pleased that my family is close and that I get to spend a lot of time with them.
That's great! I think of silly nicknames for my older brother, and then I start to wonder if people are thinking nice things about him when they hear them.
I don't need to dress up to impress my husband because he loves me for who I am.
That's sweet. I like to eat food from my parents' home country.
What kind of food do they make?
They make a lot of different kinds of food. Some of my favorites are their beef stew, chicken and dumplings, and fried chicken.
Those all sound delicious. I would love to try some of them.
Maybe we could get together sometime and you can try some of their cooking.
That would be fun. I'd love to try it.
